Field.TextData: select {DUMMY_VIEW_INVOICERPTDTL.MALCTGCOD} case 'A' : 'Airmail' case 'S' : 'Socks' case 'B' : 'SAL Mail Non Priority' case 'C' : 'Surface Mail Non Priority' case 'W' : 'Surface' case 'D' : 'Priority Sent by Surface' case 'G' : 'Prizemaster' case 'P' : '3rd Class Mail' case 'R' : 'type-mail' case 'T' : 'Mail Bags' case 'V' : 'other mail' case 'Y' : 'Empties' case 'X' : 'not counted' default:''
